channel.title: crawler on Ye Zheng's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in crawler on Ye Zheng's Blog

item.title: proxy for crawler
item.description: from proxybroker import Broker, Checker async def check(proxy): broker = Broker() ip = await broker._resolver.get_real_ext_ip() checker = Checker(judges=None, real_ext_ip=ip) results = [] for proto in ['HTTPS', 'HTTP']: result = await checker._check(proxy, proto) results.append(result) return True if any(results) else False
